source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_00<tab>Themis is eager to commence the investigation into Pandæmonium.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_00<tab>汐沫の庭のテミスは、冒険者に提案があるらしい。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_01<tab>Themis suggests that you journey to Pandæmonium together, both because it will be easier for you to gain access to the sensitive area and because you seem to be the “star” that was foretold by Themis's colleague. The first order of the day is to receive permission from the Words of Lahabrea, which Themis assures you should be a simple matter.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_01<tab>テミスは冒険者の到来を予測しており、ともに調査へと向かいたいと考えていたらしい。エルピスのアナグノリシス天測園で「ラハブレア院の職員」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_02<tab>As Themis promised, your entry into Pandæmonium is granted without issue. While the member of the Words of Lahabrea assures you that any major irregularities in the facility are seen to by Lahabrea himself, Themis seems nonetheless eager to continue his own investigation into matters.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_02<tab>職員からパンデモニウムへと入る許可を得られた。エルピスのレーテー海にある転移装置の前で「テミス」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_03<tab>As you and Themis step foot into Pandæmonium, he reveals that something or someone within is working to erode the chains and barriers which keep the creatures locked away. Though Themis uses his own magic to strengthen the protections for the moment, he suggests you seek one of the warders to gain a more thorough understanding of how the situation might be resolved. He further explains that although he cannot participate directly in battle without relinquishing his focus on the wards, he can create warriors based on your aether to aid you, should it come to that.

※Asphodelos: The First Circle can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_03<tab>パンデモニウムの結界に、何者かが攻撃を加えているらしい。内部で何が起きているかを突き止めるためにも、パンデモニウムの調査へと赴こう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_04<tab>Not long after you begin your search, a man wearing warders' garb rushes toward you, shouting an angry challenge before transforming into a towering vision of punitive might. After a pitched battle, you emerge victorious, and await his return to consciousness.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_04<tab>パンデモニウムから飛び出てきた青年「エリクトニオス」を倒した。パンデモニウム正門で、倒れているエリクトニオスの様子を見ている「テミス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_05<tab>The warder introduces himself as Erichthonios, and it seems he scarcely remembers the moments leading up to your conflict. What he can tell you is that Asphodelos─the level of Pandæmonium closest to the surface─has become overrun by monsters, and that he became separated from his colleagues in the chaos. Concerned for their safety, he begs Themis to withhold his report to the Convocation so that he can be afforded time to rescue them ere the facility is obliterated. Although Themis cannot openly shirk his duties, he states that his investigation is yet incomplete, and the two of you agree to delve further into the hellish dungeon in search of survivors─and answers.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SEQ_05<tab>エリクトニオスは、創造生物を必死に元の状態に戻そうとしていた仲間たちを、助けに向かいたいという。冒険者とテミスも、彼に協力してパンデモニウム内部へと向かうことになった。パンデモニウムの門前へと向かい、内部の様子を窺おう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Words of Lahabrea speaker.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_00<tab>ラハブレア院の職員と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Themis.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_01<tab>テミスと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_02<tab>Enter Asphodelos: The First Circle.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_02<tab>「万魔殿パンデモニウム：辺獄編1」を攻略

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Themis.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_TODO_03<tab>テミスと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_000<tab>Now then, my proposal is a simple one: let us journey to Pandæmonium together. Our destination is the same, and I suspect the arrangement would work to our mutual benefit.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_000<tab>さて……私からの提案は、シンプルなものさ。
目的地が同じなら、共にパンデモニウムへ向かおうじゃないか。
ひとりよりふたりのほうが、調査の効率も上がるだろう？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_001<tab>Besides, I should have no trouble gaining us both access. I do hope you agree─I would be loath to part ways from the falling star I had been waiting so long for.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_001<tab>私と一緒なら、
パンデモニウムへ入る許可も簡単に得られるはずだ。
それに君は……私が待ちわびていた「星」のようだしね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_002<tab>Originally I had planned to conduct my investigation with the friend I mentioned earlier. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> had also noticed the anomaly near Pandæmonium, so it only seemed natural that we should investigate it together.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_002<tab>もともと私は、同じくパンデモニウムの異変を察知した同僚と、
ふたりで調査へ向かおうとしていたんだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_003<tab>However, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> eventually decided that it would be unwise for us both to go. If two members of our organization were seen poking our heads about restricted facilities, it could raise questions, you see.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_003<tab>だが、同僚の方が渋ってね。
組織の人間がふたりも動けば、世間の注目を集めると言うのさ。
そして、こうも言った……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_004<tab>I decided to go alone, but <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> left me with these words: “Fear not, for in my absence a star shall fall before you.”
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_004<tab>「大丈夫、自分に代わる星が君の前に現れるだろう」って。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_005<tab>While I could not comprehend <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> meaning at the time, I believe now I understand. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> does have a way of being right about these things.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_005<tab>その同僚というのが、君と見間違えた「友人」さ。
<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>の言葉を信じて、待ち続けて正解だったよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_005<tab>Even so, <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> hints of what to come are generally more cryptic. I suppose I should have kept my gaze to the heavens.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_005<tab>もっとも、空から降ってくるとは思わなかったけれどね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_006<tab>Suffice it to say that I am grateful for your presence either way. As for the matter at hand, we must first gain permission from the Words of Lahabrea for entry into Pandæmonium. There ought to be a speaker waiting at Anagnorisis...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_006<tab>ともかく、パンデモニウムへ入るには、
施設を管理しているラハブレア院に許可をもらう必要がある。
まずは、アナグノリシス天測園にいる職員のところへいこう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_010<tab>I sent a request for permission before setting forth to Elpis. With luck we shall not be waiting long.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_010<tab>エルピスへ向かう前に、最低限の話は通しておいた。
すぐに許可が下りるはずさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_020<tab>What a fascinating aetheric signature... Ahem. In accordance with the Convocation's request, the two of you have been granted leave to observe Pandæmonium.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_020<tab>十四人委員会発行の推薦どおり、
パンデモニウムへの視察希望が……2名。
ひとりは、随分と変わったエーテルをお持ちのようですな。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_021<tab>I shall register your aether for the records. From this point on, you may freely come and go from Pandæmonium as you please.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_021<tab>おふたりのエーテルを、こちらで登録させていただきます。
これで以後、パンデモニウムへと至る転移装置の使用はもちろん、
施設を囲む結界も、あなた方を阻むことはありません。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_022<tab>Now, that was a painless process. I take this as a sign that we were meant to conduct our investigations together.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_022<tab>ほら、言っただろう？
私と一緒なら、簡単にパンデモニウムへ入れるって。
これで君も、私と一緒に調査へと向かえるわけだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_023<tab>Of course, while you have been permitted entry into the facility, the specimens housed inside must be handled with the utmost care. You are to heed the warders' instructions at all times.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_023<tab>……入るのは結構ですが、内部の創造生物は貴重な実験体。
「獄卒」たちの指示をちゃんと聞いてくださいますよう、
お願いいたします。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_024<tab>Those who conduct their work within Pandæmonium are called “warders” for their role with respect to the creatures within.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_024<tab>「獄卒」は、パンデモニウム内で働く者たちのことさ。
ずいぶんと禍々しい呼び名だが……それには理由があってね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_025<tab>Generally, creations that pose a threat to the safety of the star must be undone. However, the Words of Lahabrea has deemed certain such creations as worthy of further study, interring them within the facility.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_025<tab>本来、世界にとって危険である創造生物は処分されるのが決まり。
しかしラハブレア院では、まだ研究価値がある創造生物に限り、
パンデモニウムに収容して、研究を行っております。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_027<tab>Those who spend their days in Pandæmonium are not merely researchers─they must work tirelessly to ensure that none of their subjects slip their shackles.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_027<tab>当然、そうした創造生物を外部へ逃がすわけにはいきません……。
「獄卒」は研究員ではなく、創造生物を施設内に縛り付け、
厳重に監視を行う、番人なのです。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_028<tab>For all intents and purposes, the place is a dungeon. Perhaps such a comparison arouses frightful imagery, but Pandæmonium is a frightful place.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_028<tab>創造生物にとって、パンデモニウムはただの収容施設ではない。
獄卒により、いっさいの自由を奪われた「大監獄」なのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_029<tab>I know not the purpose of your investigation, but if you discover aught that merits a report, pray do so with utmost haste. Master Lahabrea shall guide us upon the proper course of action from there.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_029<tab>……あなた方も、何の調査で向かうのか知りませんが、
もし問題を見つけられましたら、すぐにご報告を。
一応は、ラハブレア様に沙汰を仰がねばなりませんので。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_029<tab>Then I take it that means you have detected nothing amiss as of late?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_029<tab>一応、か……。
現状では、問題など何も起きていないという認識なのかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_101_029<tab>The warders have reported nothing that would cause alarm. Minor fluctuations in aether have been observed, but surely Master Lahabrea would have acted if they were anything worth worrying about.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_101_029<tab>獄卒たちからは、何の報告もありません。
多少のエーテル的な揺らぎは観測されていますが……
問題あれば、それこそすでにラハブレア様が動いているはずです。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_030<tab>I see. It appears Lahabrea is kept well abreast of the goings-on here, then...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_030<tab>……なるほどね。
あのラハブレアが、管轄下のパンデモニウムの状況を、
把握していないはずがない、と。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_031<tab>I hope I am not overstepping my boundaries by asking, but... You seem to be quite familiar with Master Lahabrea. Do you know him?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_031<tab>……「あの」と言うあたり、こちらの御方は、
ずいぶんと、ラハブレア様のことをご存知のようですな。
あなた方……もしや、ラハブレア様になにか縁でも？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_Q3_000_200<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_Q3_000_200<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A1_000_200<tab>Know him? We've met.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A1_000_200<tab>彼とは面識がある

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A2_000_200<tab>Oh, the stories I could tell you...
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A2_000_200<tab>ラハブレアのことはよく知っている……

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_100_031<tab>...That a mere familiar would have had the honor to meet Master Lahabrea! He is not known to easily afford others his time, so you must be extraordinary indeed to be granted even a moment of it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_100_031<tab>……使い魔と思しき貴方も、ラハブレア様と対面しているとは。
他者と積極的に交流するような御方ではありませんので、
かなり、稀有な体験をなさっていますね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_105_031<tab>You are no mere familiar, are you? Master Lahabrea is not known for being generous with his time─that one would have “stories” of his company almost beggars belief.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_105_031<tab>……本当に、珍しい方々だ。
ラハブレア様は、他者に自身のことを話す御方ではない……。
あの御人について詳しく知る者など、そうはいませんから。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_110_031<tab>Regardless, while I doubt I need to tell you this, he is of the Convocation. Take care that your actions do not hinder his work.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_110_031<tab>ともかく、ラハブレア様は十四人委員会に名を連ねる御方……。
その活動の害となる行動は厳に慎むよう、お願いいたします。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_031<tab>And with that, we are free to make our way to Pandæmonium. The neus that will take us there is on the eastern bank of Lethe─let us delay no further.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_031<tab>さあ、いよいよパンデモニウムを拝むときがきたよ。
転移装置は、ここから北東の浮島にあるらしい。
さっそく、向かおうじゃないか……！

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_040<tab>Pandæmonium can be reached via the neus on the island to the northeast. I suggest you hurry before your companion leaves you behind.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_STAFF04476_000_040<tab>パンデモニウムへと至る転移装置は、北東の浮島です。
……急がないと、置いていかれますよ？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_045<tab>I had to contain my surprise for the sake of appearances, but is it true that you too have met Lahabrea in the flesh? I find you more fascinating by the moment...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_045<tab>これが、転移装置だね。
しかし……君もラハブレアと面識があったとは。
ますます君に興味が湧いてきたよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_045<tab>Still, I shall refrain from asking too many questions. Secrets will make our journey all the more intriguing.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_045<tab>でも、先ほど言ったとおり……
今はまだ、お互いこれ以上の詮索は止めておくとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_101_045<tab>We shall come to know each other in time, I wager. Or else why would fate have orchestrated our meeting?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_101_045<tab>時が来れば、私たちはもっと理解し合えるはずさ。
この出会いが運命なのなら、ね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_102_045<tab>In any case, let us be off. Truth be told, this will be my first time beholding the fabled Pandæmonium with my own eyes. Here's to a new adventure, eh?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_102_045<tab>今は、パンデモニウムへ。
私も実際に足を踏み入れるのは初めてなんだ。
さあ、いざ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SYSTEM_046<tab>Teleport to Pandæmonium?
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_SYSTEM_046<tab>「パンデモニウム」へと転移しますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_060<tab>It is much as I feared...
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_060<tab>まったく、なんてことだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_060<tab>The speaker seemed in such high spirits that for a moment I thought the aetherial irregularity not nearly so grave a portent as I had imagined... Alas, 'twas a fleeing and vain hope.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_060<tab>あの職員が、あまりにも呑気な態度だったものだから、
実は、何事も起きていないのではないかと少し期待していたが……
悪い方の予測が当たったようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_061<tab>To gaze upon this complex network of chains and wards, the untrained eye might not sense anything awry. No effort has been spared in making this place impenetrable.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_061<tab>ここが、どれほど厳重に封じられているかわかるかい？
周囲の鎖をはじめ、目に見えるものの多くが、
それぞれ強力な結界を構成している。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_062<tab>Even the finest of masterworks is not without its flaws, however...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_062<tab>さすがはラハブレア院、惚れ惚れするほど見事な結界……
と言いたいが、それも完璧ではなかったらしい。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_063<tab>Someone, or something, is tampering with the protections.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_063<tab>まだ、目に見えるほどの変化は起きていないが、
パンデモニウムに「何者」かが干渉している……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_063<tab>It is working from within, eroding them from the inside out.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_063<tab>そして、その何者かは、
周囲の結界を、内側から剥ぎ取ろうとしているようだ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_064<tab>Fear not─there is no immediate danger. I reinforced what protections I could the moment we arrived.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_064<tab>……ああ、今すぐ創造生物が逃げ出すような事態にはならないよ。
到着してすぐに、結界を強化する術を発動させたから。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_065<tab>This will not put an end to whatever is occurring, but it shall at least serve to slow its progress. One small victory─though the road ahead of us is yet long.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_065<tab>結界への攻撃を完全に無効化するのは無理でも、
侵食の速度を遅らせることには、成功した。
……それで、問題が解決したわけでもないけれどね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_066<tab>Yes... Powerful forces are at work here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_066<tab>状況を整理しよう。
まず第一に、僕らの疑念は現実のものとなった。
パンデモニウムでは、たしかに何らかの事件が起きている。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_067<tab>The silence in the air speaks volumes. While I did not expect a bustling facility, I see not a single warder.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_067<tab>そしてどうだい、この静けさは。
パンデモニウムを厳重に管理している獄卒の姿なんて、
影も形もないじゃないか。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_068<tab>Our first course of action should be to seek one out, wherever they may be.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_068<tab>獄卒から状況を聞きたいところだが……
まずは、彼らを捜すところから始めねばならないようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_070<tab>However, there is something you must know...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_070<tab>……これだけでも大概な状況だけれど、
もうひとつ、君に伝えておかなければならないことがある。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_071<tab>The magic I wove upon entering requires my constant awareness. That is to say─if we are forced to fight, I cannot risk joining you in battle.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_071<tab>結界を強化する術を発動させた、と言ったろう……？
少しでも術を緩めると、侵食が加速しそうな勢いでね。
実は今も、魔力を消耗し続けている状態なんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_072<tab>Should I lose focus, Pandæmonium's protections will rapidly crumble before the force assailing them.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_072<tab>つまり……。
結界への攻撃者や収監されている創造生物たちと、
もし戦闘になっても、私が相手をするのが難しくなってしまった。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_072<tab>Were there another way, I would gladly choose it─but let us at least be grateful that neither of us is here alone, trapped in hopeless circumstances.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_072<tab>突然こんなことを言われて、君が驚くのも無理はない。
私も、途方に暮れていたよ……もし、ひとりだったらね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_073<tab>If we should fail to find a peaceable solution, then I hope that I can rely on your strength to see us through.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_073<tab>大変、申し訳ないのだが……
パンデモニウム内で、平和的解決が望めなかったときは、
君の力を当てにさせてもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_Q1_000_100<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A1_000_100<tab>Of course. You have my promise.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A1_000_100<tab>任せておけ

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A2_000_100<tab>This request doesn't come as a surprise, to be honest.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_A2_000_100<tab>そんな気がしていた……

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_080<tab>Thank you for offering your help so willingly. If weapons are drawn, I hope to be able to lend at least a touch of magical support.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_080<tab>即答とは頼もしいよ……。
とはいえ、私もまったくの役立たずというわけではない。
君を支援する魔法くらいは、使えるはずだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_085<tab>At least you received it with good humor. Rest assured I do not mean to stand by idly while you risk life and limb─I hope to be able to lend at least a touch of magical support.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_085<tab>その返答、もしかしてこういう事態に慣れているのかな……？
とはいえ私も、すべてを任せて傍観しているつもりはない。
君を支援する魔法くらいは、使えるはずだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_090<tab>Creation magicks do have their uses in that regard. I had it in mind to use your aether as basis for illusory allies that will fight at your side.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_090<tab>創造魔法による支援さ、そうだね……。
君の存在を核に、君と共に戦う幻影を創造するとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_091<tab>Perhaps...seven shall do. Not exactly an army, but by the looks of you, a formidable band nonetheless.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_091<tab>そう……数は、7人ほどでどうだろうか。
いざ戦闘になれば、大きな助けになってくれるに違いない。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_092<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_092<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_093<tab>Then so shall it be. Now...what, I wonder, awaits us in Pandæmonium's pitiless halls?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_093<tab>よし、それでは、いよいよ突入といこう。
何が待ち受けるかもわからぬ万魔殿、パンデモニウムに……！

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_100<tab>I cannot say for sure what awaits us. Let us make ready for the worst, and we shall not be taken by surprise.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_100<tab>ここから先は、まさに万魔殿……。
何が待ち受けているのかは、私にもわからない。
戦闘になることも覚悟して進むとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_200<tab>That was a thrilling display! And if I may be so vaunting, the warriors I spun from your aether fought even more splendidly than I had anticipated. I suppose they were cut from excellent cloth, after all.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_200<tab>おつかれさま！
私が紡いだ幻影たちも、見事に戦ってくれたようだし、
君が、無事に勝利できたことを嬉しく思うよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_201<tab>We should wait until this man regains his senses. He wears the robes of a warder, and I would be very curious to know what drove him to attack us sight unseen.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_201<tab>それでは、この青年が目覚めるのを待つとしよう。
獄卒と思われる彼が、正気を失っていたとはいえ、
私たちを、なんの脅威と誤認したのか教えてもらわねば。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_210<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. He stirs.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_210<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、来てくれ。
彼が、目を覚ましたようだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_211<tab>What...what came over me?
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_211<tab>そんな……俺は、なんてことを……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_212<tab>It... It's coming back to me... My mind was filled with a storm of desperation...anger... I leapt at you, though I knew naught of your intentions...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_212<tab>俺のやってしまったことは理解できた。
焦燥にかられた状態で、ひとり正気を失い、
結果……あんたたち、無関係の相手に襲いかかって……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_213<tab>Pray accept my apologies. And my thanks. Had you not knocked some sense back into me, I may have fallen upon someone less capable of defending themselves.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_213<tab>本当にすまなかった……それと、ありがとう。
おかげで、冷静さを取り戻すことができた。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_215<tab>I am Erichthonios, a warder of Asphodelos─Pandæmonium's highest layer, and the place we're in now.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_215<tab>俺は、獄卒のエリクトニオス……。
パンデモニウムは、施設の大部分を地下に構えているんだが、
その中でも一番地上に近い階層、「辺獄」を持ち場としている。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_216<tab>One must wonder why you were so desperate to keep us out. What is happening in Pandæmonium?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_216<tab>君が何故、あんなに取り乱していたのか……
パンデモニウムで何が起きているのか教えてくれるかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_217<tab>The creations interred within Asphodelos have been set free, and stalk its halls to no end but violence.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_217<tab>「辺獄」に収監していた創造生物たちが、
いきなり「檻」の外に出て、暴れ始めたんだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_218<tab>That is...not good, to say the least. Has this ever happened before?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_218<tab>それは……穏やかじゃないね。
過去に、そういった脱走騒ぎは？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_219<tab>No, never. Each level of Pandæmonium is under the charge of a keyward, who keeps strict control over the most minute aspects of their domain. They're selected with great care, and their loyalty to Master Lahabrea is absolute...
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_219<tab>パンデモニウム各層には、「獄卒長」と呼ばれる管理者がいる。
彼らが、施設を厳格に取り仕切っているからな。
こんな事態は、設立以来、初めてのことだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_220<tab>Yet something has gone terribly wrong. Try as we might to hold the line, the chaos within is overwhelming... I hardly realized that I had become separated from my colleagues.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_220<tab>俺も、仲間たちと必死に対処しようとしたんだが……
混乱の中……気がついたときには、もう独りきりだった。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_221<tab>I remember a chorus of whispers assailing my senses, and afterwards only flashes of rage and fury. Then blackness...from which I awoke to find that whatever had overcome me was gone.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_221<tab>そのうち、何かに囁かれているような気がしてきて……
いつの間にか転身までして、手当たり次第に攻撃を……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_222<tab>I see... Your senses may have been muddled by magicks that affect the mind─perhaps the selfsame ones that saw you separated from the other warders.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_222<tab>ふむ……何者かによって、
精神に作用する魔法をかけられた可能性が考えられるね。
仲間と分断されたのも、その攻撃の影響かもしれない。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_223<tab>Whatever had taken hold of me, thank you for releasing me from its clutches. That you've come here from the surface must mean some word of our plight has reached the outside world. If you know anything that may help, pray tell.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_223<tab>あんたたちが来たということは、
外でも、この事件を把握しているのか？
俺の知らない情報があれば、何でも構わないから教えてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_224<tab>Horror among horrors... So Pandæmonium's protections are indeed being dismantled from within.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_224<tab>……なんてことだ。
パンデモニウムに攻撃を加えている者がいるなんて。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_225<tab>By the same individual─or individuals─that released its captives and set them upon you, no doubt. Such knowledge avails us little, however, if we cannot ascertain their identity.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_225<tab>内部の様子から鑑みるに、攻撃を仕掛けているのは、
創造生物を解き放った者と、同一人物だろう。
その正体となると、まだ見当もつかないが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_226<tab>...Themis, was it? You said you worked for an organization under the auspices of the Convocation. Were they to receive word of what has transpired here, what measures would they take?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_226<tab>テミス、だったな。
十四人委員会に連なる組織の者だと言っていたが……
この事態を委員会が知ったら、どう行動すると思う？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_227<tab>Doubtless they would consider this place to be a lost cause. Pandæmonium's ties to the outside world would be severed, or perhaps it would be wiped from existence entirely.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_227<tab>そうなれば彼らは、ここはもう「終わった場所」だと、
パンデモニウムそのものを封鎖するだろうね。
最悪の場合、施設ごと消滅させることも……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_228<tab>As I thought. Were the creatures to escape into the outside world, there would be untold carnage. The Words of Lahabrea would never risk that, despite what value the research subjects may hold.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_228<tab>……そうだよな。
結界が破られれば、危険な創造生物が外の世界に出てしまう。
その可能性を知って……躊躇うこともないか。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_229<tab>All the more reason to work with haste. If we can't expect further help, then it falls upon me to save the others. I'll not leave them behind!
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_229<tab>なら、急がないと……。
事態を公にしても誰も救えないというのなら、
俺自身がパンデモニウムに戻り、みんなを助けだす……！

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_230<tab>...You would go alone?
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_230<tab>……驚いた。
君は単身、仲間たちを救い出そうというのかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_231<tab>I won't leave the other warders to face certain doom.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_231<tab>……中にいる獄卒たちが、
消滅を受け入れるというのなら、それも仕方ないだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_232<tab>I know they fight for survival even now. They wouldn't abandon their duty─they would see the creatures returned to their cells at all costs.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_232<tab>だが、俺が最後に見たみんなは、まだ諦めてなかった……！
誰も傷つかないようにお互いを守りながら、
必死で、創造生物たちを元の状態に戻そうとしていた。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_233<tab>And so I must do the same. Themis, I know the request I'm about to make of you is a monumental one, but please...say not a word of this to the Convocation until I've been given a chance to set things right.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_233<tab>俺も、まだ諦めない。
だからテミス、どうか……
俺を信じて、十四人委員会への報告を待ってはくれないか？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_234<tab>...Forgive my rudeness, Erichthonios, but my decision cannot be swayed by emotion. You would only be consigning yourself to an early death─strength of resolve alone cannot win in the face of overwhelming odds.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_234<tab>……あいにく、先ほどの戦闘を見るかぎり、
内部の創造生物に対抗しうる力を、君が持つとは思えない。
信じようにも、信じるだけの根拠が足りないな。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_235<tab>That being said, our investigation has only just begun, and we would be remiss to turn back ere we've made an exhaustive survey. So, for the time being, there is slightly more than resolve to rely upon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_235<tab>だが、パンデモニウムの調査が私の使命である以上、
内部の様子も見ずとんぼ返りするのも、尚早な判断といえる。
戦闘は覚悟の上ではあったが……さて、どうしたものか？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_250<tab>Heh... I knew you would be all too eager to join us.
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_250<tab>ふふ、ふふふふ……やっぱり君は、そう答えるか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_251<tab>Each moment since you fell from the skies has been more interesting than the last. More and more you remind me of my dear friend.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_251<tab>まったく、本当に君は面白い。
それに妙なところで、私の友人そっくりなことをする。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_252<tab>...Which goes some way toward encouraging me that this matter will yet reach a satisfactory conclusion.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_252<tab>……ああ、もちろん私も賛成だよ。
まだ、裁定をくだすべき段階ではないからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_253<tab>So you...agree to help?
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_253<tab>なあ、あんたたち……いったい何を……？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_254<tab>For the moment, our goals align. The protective magicks of Pandæmonium yet hold, so for the moment time is in our favor. Let us proceed upon the course you and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> have set us upon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_254<tab>パンデモニウムの結界も、まだ持ちこたえられる。
だとすれば、今すべきことは……
すべて、君と<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>が示してくれただろう？

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_255<tab>Themis and...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, yes? Thank you. The warders owe you a great debt already.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_ERICHTHONIOS_000_255<tab>……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
俺の、そしてパンデモニウムのみんなのために……
本当に、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_255<tab>We shall be glad to have someone familiar with Pandæmonium's halls by our side. A party of three is ever so much more entertaining than a pair of two.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_100_255<tab>内部の状況を知る者が仲間にいるのは、こちらも頼もしいよ。
ふふふ……だいぶ奇妙な3人組になったけれどね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_256<tab>Now, let us turn our attention to rescuing your colleagues. Perhaps it would be wise to approach the gates, in case any have followed you out.
target:
TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_256<tab>さあ、具体的な救助の作戦を立てるとしよう。
まずは、パンデモニウムの門前まで近づいてみるとしようか。
エリクトニオスに続く脱出者がいないとも限らないしね。

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_240<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_240<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_245<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKRA102_04476_THEMIS_000_245<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
